alert.note: Alert for Humphreys (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 24 at 8:23PM CDT until March 25 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...TORNADO EMERGENCY FOR MIDNIGHT AND SILVER CITY... ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR HUMPHREYS AND SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 822 PM CDT, a confirmed large and destructive tornado was located 7 miles southwest of Midnight, or 12 miles northeast of Rolling Fork, moving northeast at 50 mph. TORNADO EMERGENCY for MIDNIGHT AND SILVER CITY. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW! HAZARD...Deadly tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible. The tornado will be near... Midnight around 830 PM CDT. Belzoni around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Silver City, Cary and Louise. TORNADO...OBSERVED TORNADO DAMAGE THREAT...CATASTROPHIC MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a large, extremely dangerous, and potentially deadly tornado is on the ground. To protect your life, TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If in a mobile home, a vehicle or outdoors, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! A large and extremely dangerous tornado is on the ground. take immediate tornado precautions. this is an emergency situation.
